OOC: yea i am sorry LN.....you are a good rper,,,i was having a 
bad day and decided to take it out on you.....so sorry and i hope 
you can forgive me....k dude? but back to the rpg...

BIC: Seekker looked up to the retreating Gemini.  "Come back 
here you english pigdog.  It's a minor flesh wound.  I ll bite you legs 
off" he screamed at the bot.  The looking at his leg.  "Hmm what 
happens if I touch this wi----ahhhh" Seekker leg began to kick and 
spaz.  "I can't control it captain." he said as he fell over his leg 
going insane.

Grounded looked to Gemini as he went to blast the base.  He 
winced anticipating it since he feels the pain of the organics he 
creates.  He was already on the ground reeling from the pain of the 
first blast.  As he saw the bot out of energy he sighed.
